description.S1: Every Jolicoeur Original comes with a hand-crafted golden lapel.
description.S2: Celeste ordered a lapel to commemorate her prototype,
description.S3: but the parcel must be signed for and is still at HPS.
description.S4: Head to HPS and retrieve the parcel containing her lapel.

blurb.B1: Head there and speak to Olive Yates.
blurb.B2: She'll tell you to go to window B.
blurb.B3: Speak to Wanda Chen in window B to learn the parcel is already out for delivery.
blurb.B4: Head to the nav marker in the Estates District and read the note left on the door to learn that the parcel is now back at the HPS,
blurb.B5: you'll get the HPS Delivery Unsuccessful quest item.
blurb.B6: Speak to Wanda Chen again and she'll tell you to head to window A.
blurb.B7: Speak with Olive in Window A and show her your verification to receive the parcel and the Gold Lapel quest item.

dialog.speaker: HPSClerk02 (Female)
dialog.utterance: Welcome to Halcyon Parcel Service, where all parcels are guaranteed to be delivered within acceptable margins of certainty.

dialog.speaker: HPSClerk02 (Female)
dialog.utterance: How may I be of assistance?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm here to collect a parcel for Celeste Jolicoeur.

dialog.speaker: HPSClerk02 (Female)
dialog.utterance: Let me just look that up for you.

dialog.speaker: HPSClerk02 (Female)
dialog.utterance: It appears that a parcel for Ms. Jolicoeur-comma-Celeste is currently out for delivery.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I was told the parcel was being held here.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: It is being delivered to Miss Jolicoeur's address right?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I don't have time for this.

dialog.speaker: HPSClerk02 (Female)
dialog.utterance: It was! And now it's being delivered.

dialog.speaker: HPSClerk02 (Female)
dialog.utterance: Let me see here. A parcel for Jolicoeur-comma-Celeste is being delivered to 316 Rockwell, in the Byzantium Estates.

dialog.speaker: HPSClerk02 (Female)
dialog.utterance: Thank you for allowing HPS to be your only option today.
